meanings.sent1: The heavy rain inconvenienced our picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: She was inconvenienced by the delayed flight.
meanings.sent3: The cat inconvenienced the dog by stealing its bed.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected power outage inconvenienced the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: Being inconvenienced by traffic made him late for the meeting.

meanings.sent1: Please don't inconvenienced yourself for me.
meanings.sent2: The repair work inconvenienced the residents of the building.
meanings.sent3: The lost keys inconvenienced him, but he found them in the end.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden illness inconvenienced their travel plans.
meanings.sent5: Being inconvenienced by the long line at the store frustrated her.
